attributes.action: continue  as  Prime Minister  until   at  least    the  next  general  election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE  are  concerned  about  numerous personal attacks  and  think  supporters  of  the  Prime  Minister  should  be  allowed  to  show  their  support.

WE  think  he  is  doing  a  great  job
under difficult circumstances

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
